tool_description:
Finds 5X more emails than just typical parser.
API service for ML searching hidden user mails in the Instagram service. Accepts a list of 100 to 5000 users. The request takes up to 5 minutes. Finds 15-30% of all possible mail. That is, if there are 1000 logins in the request, from 150 to 300 mails will be found.
All the data that I use is from public sources and due to minimum request restrictions it is impossible to accurately determine the ownership of the mail, so there are no conflicts wi...
name: Instagram hidden emails finder API
title: Instagram hidden emails finder API

api_list.name: Get results of request
api_list.description: Method for getting query results and downloading the list of found mails.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-hidden-emails-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com/getData"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-hidden-emails-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create a task for find hidden emails
api_list.description:
Method for create a task for find hiddend emails.
It can accept up to 5000 Instagram usernames at a time and return the id of the created task.
The list of usernames must be at least 100 unique entries.

url = "https://instagram-hidden-emails-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com/getByInstExternal"

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Find hidden Instagram followers emails by account
api_list.description:
Method for create a task for find hidden emails.
You must specify an account and you will receive the mail of followers of this account.
